Property.Name: NUM_INPUTS
Property.Description: Number of GP Inputs. The max number of GP Inputs supported is 16.

Property.Name: USE_DEBOUNCE
Property.Description: Enable/Disable build-time inclusion of debounce circuit.

Property.Name: COUNTER_WIDTH
Property.Description: The width of the debounce circuit's counter. Too calculate the width: ceil(log2(clock rate * debounce time)).

Property.Name: EDGE_MODE
Property.Description: Enable/Disable build-time inclusion of edge detector circuit.

Property.Name: RISING
Property.Description: True - Selects the edge detector's rising edge output. False - Selects the edge detector's falling edge output.

Property.Name: USE_TOGGLE
Property.Description: Enable/Disable build-time inclusion of toggle circuit.

Property.Name: EVENT_MODE
Property.Description: True - Output port data valid only when there is a change in the data to be sent the output port. False - Output port data valid every clock cycle.

Property.Name: mask_data
Property.Description: Bitfield containing the data read from the GPIO pins and the mask. The mask allows knowledge of which GPIO pins changed since the previous read cycle. The MSW must be the mask and LSW must be the data. The mask is the current data XOR the previous data.
